name: SettleaBet
0:
”Alexa, open settle a bet”
”Alexa, start settle a bet”
”Alexa, play settle a bet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: settle a bet
des: Have an argument you can't settle? Let Alexa settle it for you. You tell Alexa what each person thinks and Alexa will tell you who is probably right.
